flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: We wanted to be as eco friendly as possible. We went to our local recycling center for the cardboard for the legs and bodies. We held them together with duct tape and spray painted them. The heads and hands are made from Styrofoam insulation which we found in a construction dumpster. We used Elmer's glue to glue poster board around the Styrofoam and spray painted them yellow.
